entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, trying to cast spells with his new wand.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is afraid of spiders and tries to help Harry with his spellcasting.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A respected wizard mentioned by Ron as being young (although this is later revealed to be an error).

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend and a skilled witch who tries to help Harry with his spellcasting.

entities.name: spider
entities.description: A creature that Ron is afraid of and Harry is trying to cast spells on.

entities.name: blackthorn wand
entities.description: Harry's new wand, which he is having trouble getting used to.

entities.name: phoenix wand
entities.description: A wand that Harry has previously used and finds more powerful than his blackthorn wand.

entities.name: dumbledore's wand
entities.description: Hermione's wand, which she broke earlier in the story.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to cast spells with his new blackthorn wand.
Ron is afraid of the spider that Harry is trying to cast spells on.
Hermione owns Dumbledore's wand, which she broke earlier in the story.
Harry prefers to use his phoenix wand over his blackthorn wand.
